title: usdt-thb.com
author: usdt-thb.com
content: Hi thereI have a crypto exchange in Thailand.I have been running that for the past few years being listed at globimmo.netI've launched a web-page https://usdt-thb.comYou'll have your cash in 5 minutes anywhere in Thailand.We can fulfill any bank transfers and payments you need.telegram: @decentrathai or @antrbitWhatsApp: +66(980)923396working with any crypto listed on the TOP CEX and DEXno kyc

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: i suppose you don't offer escrow and you expect the coin or funds first.

comments.author: usdt-thb.com
comments.body: Quote from: alertoriole on May 09, 2023, 05:53:02 PMi suppose you don't offer escrow and you expect the coin or funds first. Nope. Escrow is welcome but escrow costs will be bearing by the seller.I've used cryptoexchange.com/escrow for few exchanges.Coin transfer should be in advance of cash withdrawal.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: usdt-thb.com on May 10, 2023, 03:36:49 AMQuote from: alertoriole on May 09, 2023, 05:53:02 PMi suppose you don't offer escrow and you expect the coin or funds first. Nope. Escrow is welcome but escrow costs will be bearing by the seller.I've used cryptoexchange.com/escrow for few exchanges.Coin transfer should be in advance of cash withdrawal.There are reputable escrow offers on bitcointalk. I would keep all trades here "in house", that's safer for everyone involved.The costs are also not that high. The site you mentioned charges quite some %.

Nope. Escrow is welcome but escrow costs will be bearing by the seller.I've used cryptoexchange.com/escrow for few exchanges.Coin transfer should be in advance of cash withdrawal.There are reputable escrow offers on bitcointalk. comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Hey check out our services BitSwapNopw instant cross-chain swaps and buy/sell with bank and debit card. Might be of use to you and your customers. Best of luck!
